name: VIDEO: Crest Community Prepares for Wildfires
description: After experiencing two devastating wildfires, the Crest community in the East County is creating defensible space, with the help of CAL FIRE. The fire break project is close to 165 acres and runs about 6.5 miles long and encircles the community. Be Prepared. Visit AlertSanDiego.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent:
Reading Time:  < 1 minuteAfter experiencing two devastating wildfires, the Crest community in the East County is creating defensible space, with the help of CAL FIRE. The fire break project is close to 165 acres and runs about 6.5 miles long and encircles the community.
Be Prepared. Visit AlertSanDiego.org
